Package org.daiitech.naftah.builtin.time

package org.daiitech.naftah.builtin.time
This is the base package of Naftah programming language date-time APIs.
Author:
Chakib Daii
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.daiitech.naftah.builtin
    This is the base package of Naftah programming language core classes and functions.
    org.daiitech.naftah.builtin.functions
    This is the base package of Naftah programming language builtin functions.
    org.daiitech.naftah.builtin.lang
    This is the base package of Naftah programming language core classes.
    org.daiitech.naftah.builtin.utils
    This is the base package of Naftah programming language utilities.
  • Class
    Description
    ArabicDate
    Represents an immutable Arabic date composed of: A ArabicDate.Date component (day, month, year) An optional ArabicDate.Calendar component A resolved Temporal representation
    ArabicDate.Calendar
    Represents an Arabic calendar specification.
    ArabicDate.Date
    Represents the date part of an Arabic date expression.
    ArabicDateTime
    Represents a complete Arabic date-time, consisting of: An ArabicDate component An ArabicTime component A resolved Temporal representation
    ArabicDuration
    Represents a duration expressed in Arabic text, including hours, minutes, seconds, milliseconds, and nanoseconds.
    ArabicDuration.DurationDefinition
    Definition of a duration in Arabic text, including hours, minutes, seconds, milliseconds, and nanoseconds.
    ArabicPeriod
    Represents a period expressed in Arabic text, including years, months, and days.
    ArabicPeriod.PeriodDefinition
    Definition of a period in Arabic text, including years, months, and days.
    ArabicPeriodWithDuration
    Represents a combined period and duration expressed in Arabic text.
    ArabicTemporal
    A sealed marker interface representing any Arabic temporal entity.
    ArabicTemporalAmount
    Represents a temporal amount with an Arabic textual representation.
    ArabicTemporalPoint
    Marker interface representing an Arabic temporal point.
    ArabicTime
    Represents an Arabic time expression, optionally including a time zone or offset, and a resolved Temporal representation.
    ArabicTime.Time
    Represents the time component of an Arabic time expression.
    ArabicTime.ZoneOrOffset
    Represents an Arabic time zone or numeric offset.
    DateSupport
    Provides arithmetic operations for ArabicTemporalPoint instances, including addition and subtraction of years, months, weeks, and days.
    TimeSupport
    Provides arithmetic operations for ArabicTemporalPoint instances, including addition and subtraction of hours, minutes, seconds, and nanoseconds.
